name: rgb_to_hsl
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool convexity.
Tool description: Convexity is an Color-convertor API that offers endpoints for converting between different color representations, including RGB, HSL, and CMYK
API description: Converts RGB color values to HSL color values using the RapidAPI service.

r.description: Red component of the RGB color (0-255).

g.description: Green component of the RGB color (0-255).

b.description: Blue component of the RGB color (0-255).
